text.section: If a party dies before an award is returned and judgment rendered, the cause does not abate and the arbitrators shall give a reasonable notice of the pending proceedings to the personal representative.
Notwithstanding the death of a party, the arbitrators shall proceed with a determination and return their award upon which judgment may be entered.
